title: Prime Land for Sale in Colombo 7
location: Rosmead Place, Horton Place, Colombo 7, Colombo 7
details:
Key Features

30 perches
Walking distance from Town Hall
Quiet residential area
300m from C. W. W. Kannangara Mawatha
Many amenities in the area

This prime land with two houses, conveniently located 300 meters away from C. W. W. Kannangara Mawatha, and within walking distance from Town hall. The land is rectangular shaped and measures 30 perches, selling on the land value.
Our Opinion

This land is located in a highly residential area along with easy access to array of services and amenities, which includes shopping malls (Odel and Townhall), Victoria park, hospitals (General hospital and eye hospital), all leading banks, schools and educational facilities and a range of restaurants and cafes.
